ing: 1 (10 ounce) package angel hair-style shredded cabbage
des: "When people think of coleslaw, they think of that bowl of soggy, shredded cabbage sitting at the end of the picnic table. This is a completely different approach; a fresh-shredded cabbage prepared as a fast (12 seconds adding ingredients, 30 seconds to mix), crisp, low-cal, low-carb, slightly spicy, and delicious side dish that you should be eating as part of your regular veggie side-dish rotation. Serve immediately after mixing."
ins: Stir cabbage, Thousand Island dressing, rice vinegar, hot sauce, and salt together in a bowl with a fork until evenly mixed.
